verses.verse: וַֽיִּגְּשׁוּ֙ <WH5066> vai-yig-ge-Shu came near כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> sa-Rei Then all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֔ים <WH2428> ha-cha-ya-Lim, of the forces וְיֽוֹחָנָן֙ <WH3110> ve-yo-cha-Nan and Johanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son קָרֵ֔חַ <WH7143> ka-Re-ach, of Kareah וִֽיזַנְיָ֖ה <WH3153> vi-zan-Yah and Jezaniah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son הוֹשַֽׁעְיָ֑ה <WH1955> ho-sha'-Yah; of Hoshaiah וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am and all the people מִקָּטֹ֥ן <WH6996> mik-ka-Ton from the least וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> ga-Dol. even unto the greatest

וְיַגֶּד־ <WH5046> ve-yag-ged- may shew לָ֙נוּ֙ la-nu יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> had-De-rech us the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נֵֽלֶךְ־ <WH1980> ne-lech- walk בָּ֑הּ Bah; וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> had-da-Var and the thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> na-'a-Seh. that we may do

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem then יִרְמְיָ֤הוּ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu Then Jeremiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> han-na-Vi the prophet שָׁמַ֔עְתִּי <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ti, unto them I have heard הִנְנִ֧י <WH2005> hin-Ni I am going מִתְפַּלֵּ֛ל <WH6419> mit-pal-Lel [you] behold I will pray אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem your God כְּדִבְרֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1697> ke-div-rei-Chem; according to your words וְֽהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- the whole הַדָּבָר֩ <WH1697> had-da-Var and it shall come to pass [that] whatsoever thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יַעֲנֶ֨ה <WH6030> ya-'a-Neh shall answer יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> 'et-Chem אַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> 'ag-Gid you I will declare לָכֶ֔ם <WH99999> la-Chem, לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- I will not אֶמְנַ֥ע <WH4513> 'em-Na' back מִכֶּ֖ם <WH4480> mik-Kem at דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> da-Var. nothing

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- Whether ט֣וֹב <WH2896> Tov Whether [it be] good וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- or רָ֔ע <WH7451> Ra', or whether [it be] evil בְּק֣וֹל׀ <WH6963> be-Kol the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, our God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher to whom; אֲנוּ 'a-nu כאֲנַ֜חְנוּ <WH580> 'a-Nach-nu we קשֹׁלְחִ֥ים <WH7971> sho-le-Chim send אֹתְךָ֛ <WH853> 'o-te-Cha אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> 'e-Lav about נִשְׁמָ֑ע <WH8085> nish-Ma'; we will obey לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> le-Ma-'an so אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher to whom יִֽיטַב־ <WH3190> yi-tav- thee that it may be well לָ֔נוּ <WH99999> La-nu, כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki when נִשְׁמַ֔ע <WH8085> nish-Ma', with us when we obey בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol the voice יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. our God ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> vay-Hi came מִקֵּ֖ץ <WH7093> mik-Ketz And it came to pass after עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> 'a-Se-ret ten יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> ya-Mim; days וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- that the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִרְמְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu. came unto Jeremiah

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If שׁ֤וֹב <WH7725> Shov If ye will still תֵּֽשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> te-she-Vu abide בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz in this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> haz-Zot, I וּבָנִ֤יתִי <WH1129> u-va-Ni-ti then will I build אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> 'et-Chem וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo and not אֶהֱרֹ֔ס <WH2040> 'e-he-Ros, you and not pull [you] down וְנָטַעְתִּ֥י <WH5193> ve-na-ta'-Ti and I will plant אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo and not אֶתּ֑וֹשׁ <WH5428> et-Toosh; you and not pluck [you] up כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for נִחַ֙מְתִּי֙ <WH5162> ni-Cham-ti for I repent אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- concerning הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> ha-ra-'Ah, me of the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher i עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti that I have done לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.
